meanings.definition: Covered or filled with an excessive amount of water.
meanings.sent1: The overflooded river caused widespread damage to the surrounding area.
meanings.sent2: The basement was overflooded after the heavy rainstorm.
meanings.sent3: The overflooded bathtub made a big mess in the bathroom.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like overflooded lakes, brimming with tears.
meanings.sent5: The overflooded field resembled a vast, shimmering lake under the sun.

meanings.definition: Overflowing with an excessive amount of something.
meanings.sent1: The overflooded schedule left no time for relaxation.
meanings.sent2: The overflooded market was bustling with activity.
meanings.sent3: His overflooded backpack was bursting at the seams with books.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was overflooded with memories of their time together.
meanings.sent5: The overflooded room was filled with laughter and joy during the party.
